fields.question_text: How much could the conclusions and/or findings of this paper change your view(s) if proven true?
fields.help_text: See question 3 below for a rating of certitude

fields.question_text: How much will this paper change practice in the field?
fields.help_text: Actionability, the impact the paper has on the field. The "field" we define broadly to mean either scientific practice, or real-world applications.  A change in methods used in a branch of scientific research or a new disease treatment would receive high Actionability ratings.

fields.question_text: How well proven is the finding you rated for Discovery Value?
fields.help_text: Rate how much you think the main conclusions of the paper are concrete - how much they have really been proven.  The fourth (IV) question lets you rate your expertise on the topic.

fields.question_text: How familiar are you with the topic are of this paper?
fields.help_text: Rate your expertise on the topic.
